title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1402.3 - Committee obligations
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1402.3 - Committee obligations

State Regulations
(a) Within
30 business days of the receipt of a privacy impact statement or supplemental
statement from an agency, the committee shall review such statement to
determine whether the maintenance of the system of records is within the lawful
authority of the agency, and to determine whether there have been established
rules and procedures as required by section
94
of the

Public Officers Law. (b) After
review of such information, the committee may notify the agency of the result
of its review. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
1402.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
